/usr/bin/g++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/base1.dir/opencl-base-code/base.cpp.o CMakeFiles/base1.dir/common/clutils.cpp.o  -o base1   -L/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc  -L/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL  -Wl,-rpath,/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc:/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL:/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/build/OpenCL-ICD-Loader OpenCL-ICD-Loader/libOpenCL.so.1.2 -lpthread -ldl
